amendment.description: Amendment sought to repeal the authority of the Secretary of Transportation to approve as part of the construction of federal-aid highways the costs of landscape and roadside development.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 37 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to repeal the authority of the Secretary of Transportation to approve as part of the construction of federal-aid highways the costs of landscape and roadside development.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hartzler amendment (A036) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 255 (Roll no. 594).

action.text: Hartzler amendment (A036) modified by unanimous consent.
Amendment (A036) offered by Mrs. Hartzler to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A036) offered by Mrs. Hartzler to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hartzler amendment (A036) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 255 (Roll no. 594).
